Providence.Brown Association for Cooperative Housin:
The Brown Association for Cooperative Housing (BACH) is a 501(c)3 non-profit student housing cooperative located in Providence, Rhode Island. BACH was the first non-profit co-operative in the country given non-profit status on the basis of fighting gentrification.


== History ==
BACH's founding resulted directly from a Group Independent Study Project (GISP) organized by Brown University students in 1970.
